creator: sjones@rational.com
text:
Configure 2 (more?) instances of Catalina to load the same webapp from a WAR 
file in a shared webapps directory. Start them concurrently (I used services 
and dependencies). The WAR file gets expanded partially, leading to a broken 
application in all the Tomcat instances. Observed with 3MB WAR file. 
Win2k/Intel/1 CPU

I don't know if Catalina wants to support this config, but entered bug FYI.

I don't see how we can support this configuration as the multiple instances 
would need to co-operate in order to explode the WAR without interfering with 
each other. This strikes me as complicated to implement for little benefit.

If you want to use this configuration then may I suggest one of the following 
alternatives:
- set hosts' unpackWARs attribute to false
- deploy WARs in unpacked form
